CSI API ETABS v1

cDStItalianNTC2018SSetPreference Method

Sets the value of a steel design preference item.

Namespace:  ETABSv1
Assembly:  ETABSv1 (in ETABSv1.dll) Version: 1.0.0.0 (2.3.0.0)

	int Item,

	double numericValue
)
Function SetPreference (
	Item As Integer,
	textValue As String,
	numericValue As Double
) As Integer

Dim instance As cDStItalianNTC2018S
Dim Item As Integer
Dim textValue As String
Dim numericValue As Double
Dim returnValue As Integer

returnValue = instance.SetPreference(Item,
	textValue, numericValue)
int SetPreference(
	int Item,
	String^ textValue,
	double numericValue
)
abstract SetPreference :
        Item : int *
        textValue : string *
        numericValue : float -> int

Parameters

Item
Type: SystemInt32
This is an integer between 3 and 23, inclusive, indicating the preference item considered.
  1. Method used for Buckling in P-M-M
  2. Framing type
  3. Partial safety factor, GammaM0
  4. Partial safety factor, GammaM1
  5. Partial safety factor, GammaM2
  6. Consider deflection
  7. DL deflection limit, L/Value
  8. SDL + LL deflection limit, L/Value
  9. LL deflection limit, L/Value
  10. Total load deflection limit, L/Value
  11. Total camber limit, L/Value
  12. Pattern live load factor
  13. Demand/capacity ratio limit
  14. Multi-response case design
  15. Behavior factor, q
  16. System overstrength, Omega
  17. Consider P-delta
  18. Consider torsion
  19. Ignore seismic code
  20. Ignore special seismic load
  21. Are Doubler plates plug-welded
textValue
Type: SystemString
The string value of the considered preference item.
numericValue
Type: SystemDouble
The numeric value of the considered preference item.
  1. Method used for Buckling in P-M-M
    • 1 = Method A
    • 2 = Method B
    • 3 = Both
  2. Framing type
    • 1 = DCH-MRF
    • 2 = DCL-MRF
    • 3 = DCH-CBF
    • 4 = DCL-CBF
    • 5 = DCH-EBF
    • 6 = DCL-EBF
    • 7 = InvPendulum
    • 8 = Non Dissipative
  3. Partial safety factor, GammaM0

    Value > 0

  4. Partial safety factor, GammaM1

    Value > 0

  5. Partial safety factor, GammaM2

    Value > 0

  6. Consider deflection

    1 or "No" - Default

    2 or "Yes"

  7. DL deflection limit, L/Value

    Value > 0

  8. SDL + LL deflection limit, L/Value

    Value > 0

  9. LL deflection limit, L/Value

    Value > 0

  10. Total load deflection limit, L/Value

    Value > 0

  11. Total camber limit limit, L/Value

    Value > 0

  12. Pattern live load factor

    Value > 0

  13. Demand/capacity ratio limit

    Value > 0

  14. Multi-response case design
    • 1 = Envelopes
    • 2 = Step-by-Step
    • 3 = Last Step
    • 4 = Enveleopes -- All
    • 5 = Step-by-Step -- All
  15. Behavior factor, q

    Value > 0

  16. System overstrength, Omega

    Value > 0

  17. Consider P-delta

    1 or "No" - Default

    2 or "Yes"

  18. Consider Torsion

    1 or "No" - Default

    2 or "Yes"

  19. Ignore seismic code

    1 or "No" - Default

    2 or "Yes"

  20. Ignore special seismic load

    1 or "No" - Default

    2 or "Yes"

  21. Are Doubler plates plug-welded

    1 or "No" - Default

    2 or "Yes"

Return Value

Type: Int32
Returns zero if the item is successfully retrieved; otherwise it returns a nonzero value.
Remarks
Examples
VB
Copy
Public Sub Example()
   Dim SapModel As cSapModel
   Dim EtabsObject As cOAPI
   Dim ret As Integer = -1
   dim textValue As String
   Dim Value As Double
   Dim ProgDet As Boolean

'create ETABS object
   Dim myHelper as cHelper = New Helper
   EtabsObject = myHelper.CreateObjectProgID("CSI.ETABS.API.ETABSObject")

'start ETABS application
  ret = EtabsObject.ApplicationStart()

'create SapModel object
   SapModel = EtabsObject.SapModel

'initialize model
   ret = SapModel.InitializeNewModel()

'create steel deck template model
   ret = SapModel.File.NewSteelDeck(4, 12, 12, 4, 4, 24, 24)

'set steel design code
   ret = SapModel.DesignSteel.SetCode("Italian NTC 2018")

'set overwrite item
   ret = SapModel.DesignSteel.Italian_NTC_2018.SetPreference(2, "DCH-MRF", 1)

'close ETABS
   EtabsObject.ApplicationExit(False)

'clean up variables
   SapModel = Nothing
   EtabsObject = Nothing

End Sub
